name: Worlds In-Between
description:
A frustrating and short platformer where the goal is to get to the very top.

You play a hungry robot that is determined to get to the top to eat the sandwich that lies there. The twist is that the way to the top in incomplete. In order to successfully go to the top, you must teleport to other world to show the hidden paths.

This game was created for "My First Game Jam: Summer 2020".

Controls:

W - Jump

A - Left

D - Right

R - Restart Level

J - Change to World 1

K - Change to World 2

L - Change to World 3

H & ; - Change to World 0
